property.name: cacheplanner.algorithm.mode
property.description: Currently, supported modes are: online, offline

property.name: cacheplanner.algorithm.setup
property.description: Currently, supported modes are: multi, single

property.name: cacheplanner.algorithm.batchtime
property.description: Only applicable in online mode. batch time in millisecond

property.name: cacheplanner.generator.mode
property.description: Currently supported modes: singleTable - generate single table queries replay - replay the experiment from the input json file

property.name: cacheplanner.generator.replayfile
property.description: If replay mode is on, the input json file should be set.
